Overview

The challenge consisted of three external API's usage, state management, responsive layout all wrapped in a single-page React App. The project was a solution to IP-Tracker challenge.

The challenge

User stories that needed to be fulfilled:

  • -View the optimal layout for the site depending on their device's screen size
  • -See hover states for all interactive elements on the page
  • -See their own IP Address on the map on the initial page load
  • -Search for any IP addresses or domains and see the key information and location
